sentence.Network_en: Persons dying from cancer grow thin and visibly waste away.
sentence.Network_cn: 因患癌症濒临死亡的人会日渐消瘦，而且身体明显衰弱。

sentence.Network_en: As they approached the outskirts of the city, Ella's mood visibly lightened.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们快到市郊时，埃拉的情绪明显好转。

sentence.Network_en: The National Health Service has visibly deteriorated, despite increased spending.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管支出在增加，但国民医疗保健服务的质量却明显下降了。

entry.def: If something is visible, it  can be seen.

example.ex: The warning lights were clearly visible...
They found a bacterium visible to the human eye...
example.tran: 他们发现了一种肉眼可见的细菌。

entry.tran: 明显的;引人注目的;能认出的
entry.def: You use visible to describe something or someone that people notice or recognize.

example.ex: The most visible sign of the intensity of the crisis is unemployment...
example.tran: 预示危机严重程度的一个最显著的迹象就是失业情况。

example.ex: He was making a visible effort to control himself...
example.tran: 他明显是在努力控制自己的情绪。

entry.def: In economics, visible earnings are the money that a country makes as a result of producing goods, rather than from services such as banking and tourism.

example.ex: In the UK visible imports have traditionally been greater than visible exports.
example.tran: 在英国，传统上有形产品的进口一直大于出口。

auth_sentence.content: Kenny Dalglish was visibly emotional at the final whistle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kenny Dalglish was visibly emotional at the final whistle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kenny Dalglish was visibly emotional at the final whistle.

auth_sentence.content: The boss came out of the meeting visibly distraught.
auth_sentence.res_content: The boss came out of the meeting visibly distraught.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The boss came out of the meeting visibly distraught.

auth_sentence.content: Ravi was visibly anxious when the judge addressed him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ravi was visibly anxious when the judge addressed him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ravi was visibly anxious when the judge addressed him.

sentences.en: The factors for war were visibly increasing.
sentences.cn: 这时战争因素有明显增长。

sentences.en: The incident had left him visibly angry and upset.
sentences.cn: 那起事件显然让他既恼火又心烦。

sentences.en: The officers on duty were visibly overcome, many of them in tears.
sentences.cn: 那些值班的官员明显不能自持，许多人都流出了眼泪。

sentences.en: The old nun was as imperious as ever, but visibly thawed when she saw the children.
sentences.cn: 老修女仍然像从前一样专橫，看到孩子们时却显得温和多了。
